components.description: A person playing the sport of handball, shown jumping in the air about to throw the ball. Apple's design is shown wearing protective goggles.
components.title: Handball

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a diagonal arrow pointing out the top-right, used as a representation for men.
components.title: Male Sign

description: A man playing the sport of handball, shown jumping in the air about to throw the ball. Apple's design is shown wearing protective goggles.
title: Man Playing Handball

emoji_net_data.definition: The Man Playing Handball emoji is a sequence of the ?? Handball, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16 emojis. These are combined using a  http://emojipedia.org/man-playing-handball/
emoji_net_data.name: man playing handball

bn:13656166v: To illegally touch the ball with the hand or arm.

bn:13656167v: To (legally) pass a football by holding it with one hand and hitting it with the other.

bn:00042794n: A game played in a walled court or against a single wall by two or four players who strike a rubber ball with their hands
A team sport where two teams of seven players each (six players and a goalkeeper) pass and bounce a ball trying to throw it in the goal of the opposing team. (source: wikipedia)
A team sport where two teams of seven players each (six players and a goalkeeper) pass and bounce a ball trying to throw it in the goal of the opposing team.
Handball is a team sport in which two teams of seven players each pass a ball to throw it into the goal of the other team.

bn:00036052n: An act of passing a football by holding it with one hand and hitting it with the other.
An act that violates the rules of a sport.
Fouls and misconduct in association football are acts committed by players which are considered deemed by the referee to be unfair and are subsequently penalized.
An act that violates the rules of a sport
Unfair act by a player in association football

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the man playing handball emoji showcases an athletic figure in motion, dynamically poised to strike the ball. The character, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting, appears focused and strong, with the handball itself a perfectly round sphere. This emoji vividly represents sports, activity, and energetic engagement, ideal for conveying a sense of playfulness or a passion for athletic pursuits on Apple devices.
